SEARCH
Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.syncing.api.graph

Interface SyncedUniverse

All Known Subinterfaces:
KNetSyncedUniverse, LNSSyncedUniverse
public interface SyncedUniverse
Manages server to client synchronization of a GraphUniverse

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    @Nullable GraphView
    getClientGraphView()
    Gets the GraphView of this client, if this is indeed a physical client.
    @NotNull net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation
    getId()
    Gets the unique id of this universe.
    @Nullable GraphView
    getSidedGraphView(@NotNull net.minecraft.world.level.Level world)
    Gets the GraphView for the given Level.
    @NotNull SyncProfile
    getSyncProfile()
    Gets this universe's synchronization profile.
    @NotNull GraphUniverse
    getUniverse()
    Gets the graph universe that this handler synchronizes.
    void
    register()
    Registers this synchronization handler so that it can be found by its universe's id.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      @NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation getId()
      Gets the unique id of this universe.
      Returns:
      this universe's unique id.

    • getUniverse

      @NotNull @NotNull GraphUniverse getUniverse()
      Gets the graph universe that this handler synchronizes.
      Returns:
      the universe associated with this synchronization handler.

    • getSidedGraphView

      @Nullable @Nullable GraphView getSidedGraphView(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.world.level.Level world)
      Gets the GraphView for the given Level.

      This works on both the logical server and the logical client, unlike GraphUniverse.getGraphWorld(ServerLevel) which only works on the logical server.

      Parameters:
      world - the world to get the graph view associated with.
      Returns:
      the graph view associated with the given world.

    • getClientGraphView

      @Nullable @Nullable GraphView getClientGraphView()
      Gets the GraphView of this client, if this is indeed a physical client.
      Returns:
      the graph view of this client, if this is indeed a physical client, or null if this is a physical server.

    • register

      void register()
      Registers this synchronization handler so that it can be found by its universe's id.

      If this synchronization handler is not registered, it will not work.

    • getSyncProfile

      @NotNull @NotNull SyncProfile getSyncProfile()
      Gets this universe's synchronization profile.
      Returns:
      this universe's synchronization profile.
